setParameters.description: The message allows to change parameters values to enable/disable specific features

setConfig.description: The message allows to set platform parameters

stopProgram.description: The command allows to stop the program

PROGRAMS.DW.ECO_BLDC.description: Program for normally soiled tableware (the most efficient in terms of its combined energy and water consumption for that type of tableware). Program STANDARDISED TO EN 50242.

PROGRAMS.DW.STEAM_PLUS.description: Suitable for washing pots and all other particularly dirty crockery.

PROGRAMS.DW.AUTO_UNIVERSAL_SOIL.description: Suitable for soiled pans and any other normally dirty items

PROGRAMS.DW.RAPID_59.description: This is a full load programme designed to wash and dry in less than an hour, maintaining high wash quality performance.

PROGRAMS.DW.GENTLE_WASH.description: Program suitable for Class A single-cycle washing of the most delicate crockery such as glassware and porcelain. Suitable for washing dishes up to 8 place settings. (Duration: 100 min)

PROGRAMS.DW.PREWASH.description: Brief pre-wash cycle for used dishes in the morning or at noon, when you want to postpone washing the full load.

PROGRAMS.DW.HYGIENE_PLUS.description: An antibacterial cycle, intended for washing and sterilising dishes (even heavily stained ones), baby bottles, etc.

PROGRAMS.DW.INTENSIVE_RAPID.description: Intended for rapid washing of very dirty dishes.

PROGRAMS.DW.AUTO_UNIVERSAL_PLUS_SOIL.description: Suitable for everyday dishwashing. Two final rinses ensure a high level of hygiene and cleanliness.

PROGRAMS.DW.AUTO_SENSOR_SOIL.description: Fast cycle for normally dirty dishes - intended for frequent washes and normal loads.

PROGRAMS.DW.ULTRA_SILENCE.description: Quietest washing cycle. Ideal for functioning by night and for taking advantage of reduced energy fares.

PROGRAMS.DW.GLASSWARE.description: Suitable for delicate crockery and glassware. Also for less soiled items excluding pans.

PROGRAMS.DW.RAPID_39.description: Wash&Dry Class A fast washing cycle. Suitable for washing dishes up to 8 place settings. (Duration: 39 min)

PROGRAMS.DW.RAPID_29.description: Super fast cycle for dishes to run immediately after the meal. Intended for 4/6 persons washing load.

PROGRAMS.DW.DISHWASHER_CARE.description: Special maintenance cycle (to be carried out without load) for cleaning the tub, using a special additive. The app will advise you when it is time to run this program.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_TURBOPOWER.description: Intensive programme for washing a full load of very dirty dishes, such as pots, pans, casserole dishes. Penetrates into dried residues, ensuring deep cleaning. Not suitable for delicate items.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_BABY_CARE.description: Intensive cycle for sanitising baby bottles and pacifiers, using high temperatures. Ensures effective sterilisation, ideal for children's items.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_EXTRA_HYGIENE.description: Intensive programme for washing and sterilising a full load, even if heavily soiled, alternating water and steam jets. Removes dried dirt and 99% of bacteria, no pre-rinse required.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_SUPER_WASH.description: Long programme for a full load of very soiled dishes with dry residues. Not recommended for delicate or decorated items. Ensures thorough cleaning.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_WOK_GRIDS_MAXI_PANS_SOIL.description: Intense cycle tailored for a full load of large pans, woks and grids, ensuring a thorough cleaning action. Achieves exceptional results, for easy cleaning of challenging cookware.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_DAILY_CARE_SOIL.description: Efficient programme to wash a full load of mixed, medium to heavily soiled dishes offering a fresh solution for daily washing needs.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_POWER_MIX_WASH_SOIL.description: Efficient cycle ideal for a full load of medium soiled dishes, suitable for all dish types for thorough cleaning. Guarantees effortless quality with every wash.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_POT_&_PANS_SOIL.description: Ideal cycle for accurate washing of pots and pans for everyday use, not encrusted.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_PYREX_AND_GLASSWARE.description: Rapid cycle for a full load of lightly soiled glassware, which dissolves grease and enhances the shine on glass pans, Pyrex and other glass dishes.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_PLASTIC_TUPPERWARE.description: Efficient programme for washing plastic materials and food containers, ensuring the thorough and safe cleaning of a full load.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_COCKTAIL_GLASSES_SOIL.description: Thanks to this cycle, you can wash and dry your cocktail glasses and plates with a quite rapid program that cleans them perfectly.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_PIZZA_MENU_SOIL.description: Efficient cycle tailored for pizza lovers, perfect for washing a full load of plates and cutlery after a pizza party with friends or family.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_PORCELAIN.description: Efficient programme designed for a full load of porcelain dishes, wedding services or other delicate items, ensuring a risk-free wash without any damage.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_CHINA_CRYSTALS.description: Efficient cycle dedicated to the most delicate items such as crystal glasses, providing soft but thorough cleaning. Ensures perfect results for your finest pieces (full load).

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_PARTY_SOIL.description: Simple cycle that you can use after a dinner with friends, or after a party, to wash all the dishes used.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_HAPPY_HOUR.description: Efficient programme designed for lightly soiled appetizer plates and glasses from Happy Hour events, perfect for half loads and overnight use.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_DINNER_FOR_TWO_SOIL.description: Cycle dedicated to your "couple life" or to all the dinner-for-two events, to wash all the dishes used, even if the load of the machine is not full.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_SINGLE.description: Cycle dedicated to single people who use the dishwasher anyway, even if they have few dishes to wash.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_BREAKFAST.description: Rapid programme for breakfast cups, small spoons and other dishes, offering optimal results in limited time. Ideal when you can't wait for a full dishwasher load.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_SUPER_FLASH.description: Rapid cycle to wash a few normally soiled dishes (including half load), ideal for people who rarely eat at home

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_VOICE_ECO.description: Program for normally soiled tableware (the most efficient in terms of its combined energy and water consumption for that type of tableware). Program STANDARDISED TO EN 50242.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_VOICE_UNIVERSAL.description: Suitable for soiled pans and any other normally dirty items

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_VOICE_AUTOMATIC.description: Fast cycle for normally dirty dishes - intended for frequent washes and normal loads.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_VOICE_PREWASH.description: Brief pre-wash cycle for used dishes in the morning or at noon, when you want to postpone washing the full load.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_VOICE_RAPID_59.description: This is a full load programme designed to wash and dry in less than an hour, maintaining high wash quality performance.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_CHECKUP.description: Short diagnostic cycle to check if the main components of the appliance are functioning correctly.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_FAIRY_QUICK_CYCLE.description: Efficient cycle, combined with FAIRY PLATINUM PLUS, ensures tough food residues are cleaned off normally soiled dishes in less than 1 hour.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_DREFT_QUICK_CYCLE.description: Efficient cycle, combined with DREFT PLATINUM PLUS, ensures tough food residues are cleaned off normally soiled dishes in less than 1 hour.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_JAR_QUICK_CYCLE.description: Efficient cycle, combined with JAR PLATINUM PLUS, ensures tough food residues are cleaned off normally soiled dishes in less than 1 hour.

PROGRAMS.DW.IOT_YES_QUICK_CYCLE.description: Efficient cycle, combined with YES PLATINUM, ensures tough food residues are cleaned off normally soiled dishes in less than 1 hour.
